tool_description: Evaluates geographic risk factors based on transaction location, customer travel patterns, and regional risk intelligence.
error_messages: Invalid location format: Use ISO country codes or recognized city names
Location not recognized: The provided location is not in the geographic database
Missing home location: Customer home location is required for risk assessment
usage: Provide transaction_location and customer_home_location. Optionally include recent_locations array for enhanced travel pattern analysis.

location_risk_score.description: Risk score for the transaction location (0-100)

distance_from_home.description: Distance from customer home location in kilometers

country_risk_level.description: Risk level of transaction country (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH)

travel_pattern_anomaly.description: Whether location represents unusual travel pattern

risk_factors.description: List of geographic risk factors identified
